channel.title: General Security Money Privilege on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in General Security Money Privilege on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: Security of a transaction
item.description: I think it is interesting that i can make a purchase and then use the restroom in a restaurant - but i wasn’t allowed to before i made the purchase. Like going to starbucks and buying a coffee so i can use the bathroom. the 3 dollars means i could use drugs, kill children or whatever they are trying to stop by making the bathrooms for customers only. I see this sort of transaction a lot.
